name: Piratemind
description:
My double entry for Nokia 3310 Jam 3 and Untitiled Game Jam #42.

You are playing as an excellent pirate. Your mind can see things others can't: buried treasures, hidden passages, deadly traps! Use it to become the best pirate in the universe!

Controls:

WSAD or Arrow Keys - Movement

X - Interact or attack

Z - throw shovel

R - restart level

Escape - Go back to menu

Credits:

Gameplay and graphics by Kiel97

Godot Starter Project by SlothDevLlama (https://itch.io/profile/slothdevllama)

Sound Effects by Trix (https://twitter.com/Trixelized)
